text: Pedro Peña Allén (December 14, 1925 - October 2, 2014) was an Spanish actor. He was known for his roles in Médico de familia (1995), Un paso adelante (2002) and Dulce (2011). He was born in Tordehumos, Spain. Peña died in Madrid, Spain from Alzheimer's disease, aged 88. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1925 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from Alzheimer's disease Category:Spanish movie actors Category:Spanish television actors
